location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged chronologically from the front to the rear of the file.
Foliation: The foliation system in uses is the sequence of numbers appearing in a circle in the top right hand corner.

mods.abstract: Correspondence relating to Bahrain Yacht Clubs. Includes time-table for a yacht race with a hand drawn map of the course and purchase of a yacht Viking by Captain Tom Hickinbotham, Assistant Political Agent, Miranshah, Waziristan. Correspondents include Captain George Ashmead Cole, Political Agent, Bahrain; Captain Tom Hickinbotham, Assistant Political Agent, Miranshah, Waziristan.
